title: 2014 - The Year In Christian Music (Bundle 43)
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2014 - THE YEAR IN CHRISTIAN MUSIC
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

So I've been doing some traveling since my 42nd bundle.  As a matter of fact, as soon as that bundle completed to 100%, I headed out of the country that same very afternoon.  And I've been away from home since.  Only returning yesterday.

While away, I had an opportunity to stop by a few threads, and read some comments.  And I've got to say, I wasn't eager to return home to share anything more here.  Or perhaps even for the next few months, to be honest.  It wasn't so long ago that there was a sense of community within these threads.  It wasn't so long ago that a few prayer requests even started to surface here and there.  People were talking.  God was being glorified.  Music and prayer requests were being met.

Well, as we all know, it's no longer like that here.  And I imagine that's perhaps why many of you regulars are no longer posting comments.  So I'll be blunt.  Your silence is contributing to me spending more of my time sharing elsewhere, and less time sharing here.  And because all of you can locate and download this music just as easily as I can, I lack that drive to do so for you.

We all ought to give a shout out to CJ4321 today.  CJ4321 registered an account here, and posted a few words in that last 42nd thread.  Telling me that he is responsible for finding new music for his Church Band to perform, and often times uses these bundles as a source for that music.  Brethren, please make no mistake about it, it is because of him (and only him) that I am eager to share this 43rd bundle today.

CONTEMPORARY: Among The Thirsty, For King And Country, Phil King.  PRAISE & WORSHIP: Bethel Music, Citipointe Live, Every Nation Music, John Waller, Morhan Taylor, Shane And Shane.  HARDCORE/METAL: The Color Morale, Redeemer, Sleeping Giant.  POP: Colton Dixon.  GOSPEL: Deitrick Haddon, Mighty Men Of Faith, Nona Jones, Smokie Norful, Tasha Page-Lockhart.  ALTERNATIVE: Group1Crew, Quietdrive.  SINGER-SONGWRITER: Lexi Elisha.  HIP-HOP/RAP: Loc Saint, Mr Del, Puntin, Shai Linne, Swoope.  ROCK: Thousand Foot Krutch.

There are 30 titles being offered in today's bundle, including...

 * Among The Thirsty - 2014 - Completely - Single
 * Bethel Music - 2014 - You Make Me Brave - Studio Version - Single
 * Citipointe Live - 2014 - Wildfire
 * Color Morale, The - 2014 - Damnaged - Single
 * Colton Dixon - 2014 - Dare To Believe - Single
 * Deitrick Haddon - 2014 - My Soul Says Yes - Single
 * Every Nation Music - 2014 - One
 * For King And Country - 2014 - Without You - Single
 * Group1Crew - 2014 - Faster EP
 * John Waller - 2014 - Worship While I'm Waiting
 * Lexi Elisha - 2014 - Rope EP
 * Loc Saint - 2014 - Back 2 Roots
 * Mighty Men Of Faith - 2014 - Nothing But Grace
 * Morhan Taylor - 2014 - Yes Jesus Loves Me EP
 * Mr Del - 2014 - Faith Walka
 * Nona Jones - 2014 - Take Me EP
 * Phil King - 2014 - Giants And Oceans
 * Puntin - 2014 - Southern Hospitality 2
 * Quietdrive - 2014 - The Ghost Of What You Used To Be
 * Redeemer - 2014 - Deadweight
 * Shai Linne - 2014 - Lyrical Theology Pt 2 Doxology - Instrumentals
 * Shane And Shane - 2014 - The Worship Initiative, Vol 2
 * Shane And Shane - 2014 - The Worship Initiative, Vol 3
 * Shane And Shane - 2014 - The Worship Initiative, Vol 4
 * Shane And Shane - 2014 - The Worship Initiative, Vol 5
 * Sleeping Giant - 2014 - Finished People - Single
 * Smokie Norful - 2014 - Forever Yours
 * Swoope - 2014 - Sinema
 * Tasha Page-Lockhart - 2014 - Here Right Now
 * Thousand Foot Krutch - 2014 - Oxygen Inhale

Blessings,
TorrentTracts, August 2014
